data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Mazɔlɔɔ faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta mɛɛin ɠaalɛɛzu,
Siɛgi zu ma ɓogiti ti lokasu da,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa sei ʋɛlɛ ɲadegai wu.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa telebo nui ta faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-vai wuuʋɛtɛsu.
É abulekai ʋu kae faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ma, nii é ɠalazu ga timinigi.
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zɔlegɛ, telebo faiti nɛɛʋɛ bɛ.
